page.title: 19Our National Game.
page.content: Gareth Roberts is a local man who is also a Welsh international rugby player.He attended school in Gowerton and as a result of playing for the school team,played rugby in New Zealand before he was 18.He started playing rugby at 11 years of age and was good because of his immense size even at that young age. He won his first Welsh cap during the 1985 season against England at Cardiff Arms Park in Cardiff.He told us during our interview with him that it was a very proud moment for him to walk out in front of 67,000 people,but also a very nervous one.He also told us that the ability to speak Welsh to some of his team mates was a great advantage,especially playing against England.It is very special to have a Welsh player living in our area and a great thrill to have met him.
